description: Fit, bald-headed Orson Dean can’t seem to stay out of trouble when it comes to dating. He’s living with his ex, ripped Pietro Duarte and his current beau, muscular Louis Ricaute. He simply can’t resist slender stud Gabriel Phoenix when he comes over, and seduces him while Louis is in the shower. Tanned Louis is shocked to find them locking lips, and immediately calls Pietro downstairs so he can see what is going on. Gabriel suggests they all play together, and a hot orgy ensues.
title: Emergency Sex Part 3
